step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LU_FACE (PID) (SELECT P.FACE_PID FROM LU_FACE P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[polygon]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LU_LINK (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT T.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_LU_FACE P, LU_FACE_TOPO T WHERE P.PID = T.FACE_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LU_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.S_NODE_PID FROM LU_LINK P, TEMP_LU_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT P.E_NODE_PID FROM LU_LINK P, TEMP_LU_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LU_FEATURE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT P.FEATURE_PID FROM LU_FACE P, TEMP_LU_FACE T WHERE P.FEATURE_PID!=0 AND P.FEATURE_PID!=-1 AND P.FACE_PID=T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM LU_FACE P,TEMP_LU_FACE T WHERE P.FACE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM LU_FACE_TOPO P, TEMP_LU_FACE R WHERE P.FACE_PID = R.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM LU_FACE_NAME P, TEMP_LU_FACE R WHERE P.FACE_PID= R.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM LU_LINK P, TEMP_LU_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM LU_LINK_MESH P, TEMP_LU_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM LU_LINK_KIND P, TEMP_LU_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM LU_NODE P, TEMP_LU_NODE R WHERE P.NODE_PID = R.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM LU_NODE_MESH P, TEMP_LU_NODE R WHERE P.NODE_PID = R.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM LU_FEATURE P, TEMP_LU_FEATURE R WHERE P.FEATURE_PID = R.PID;
DELETE FROM LU_FACE P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LU_FACE T );
DELETE FROM LU_FACE_TOPO P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LU_FACE T );
DELETE FROM LU_FACE_NAME P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LU_FACE T );
DELETE FROM LU_LINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LU_LINK T );
DELETE FROM LU_LINK_MESH P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LU_LINK T );
DELETE FROM LU_LINK_KIND P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LU_LINK T );
DELETE FROM LU_NODE P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LU_NODE T );
DELETE FROM LU_NODE_MESH P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LU_NODE T );
DELETE FROM LU_FEATURE P WHERE P.FEATURE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LU_FEATURE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LU_FACE SELECT FACE_PID FROM LU_FACE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM LU_FACE B WHERE A.FACE_PID = B.FACE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LU_LINK SELECT LINK_PID FROM LU_LINK A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM LU_LINK B WHERE A.LINK_PID = B.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LU_NODE SELECT NODE_PID FROM LU_NODE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM LU_NODE B WHERE A.NODE_PID = B.NODE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LU_FEATURE SELECT FEATURE_PID FROM LU_FEATURE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM LU_FEATURE B WHERE A.FEATURE_PID = B.FEATURE_PID);
